SpellDef.Description:
Improves the targets Attack.
See Tooltip.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: ::: HIERGAMENON ENTRY ::: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
[S] BLOOD RAGE #ARMY ::: Improves the targets Attack.
DOMAIN ::: Strategic ::: Friendly ::: Champions+Sovereign
EFFECT ::: + 1 ATK
FIGHTABLE ::: Not Defendable ::: Not Resistible
INTERVAL ::: Permanent
OTHER ::: Can Stack ::: Chaos Multiplier ::: Time Bonus (Sov) ::: Player Only
::: Caster and Targets must be on the same tile
SOURCE ::: Spell Rank ::: ::: Death Archmage

Targets Weapon does additional Fire Damage.
See Tooltip. See WARNINGS.
--------------------------------------------------- !WARNING! Generally, Mass Army Spells do not stack with the Individual or the Mass Faction versions.
Mass Army Spells disable the equivalent Mass Faction Spells (Spellbook).
IF you want to re-enable a specific Mass Faction Spell, dispel the equivalent Mass Army Spell: CTRL-K (Govern) > Enchantments > Dispel ---------------------------------------------------
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: ::: HIERGAMENON ENTRY ::: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
[S] BURNING BLADE #ARMY ::: Targets Weapon does additional Fire Damage.
DOMAIN ::: Strategic ::: Friendly ::: Champions+Sovereign
EFFECT ::: + (2 + Fire Shards) Fire DMG #Tactical
FIGHTABLE ::: Not Defendable ::: Not Resistible
INTERVAL ::: Until Dispelled (Enchantment)
OTHER ::: Fire Shards (+1 per) ::: Upgradable Value #Automatic ::: Time Bonus (Sov) ::: Player Only
::: Incompatible w/ Burning Blade ::: Incompatible w/ Burning Blade #Faction
::: Caster and Targets must be on the same tile
SOURCE ::: Spell Rank ::: ::: Fire Mage

Improves the targets Initiative.
See Tooltip.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: ::: HIERGAMENON ENTRY ::: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
[S] CELERITY #ARMY ::: Improves the targets Initiative.
DOMAIN ::: Strategic ::: Friendly ::: Champions+Sovereign
EFFECT ::: + 1 Initiative
FIGHTABLE ::: Not Defendable ::: Not Resistible
INTERVAL ::: Permanent
OTHER ::: Can Stack ::: Air Multiplier ::: Time Bonus (Sov)
::: Caster and Targets must be on the same tile
SOURCE ::: Spell Rank ::: ::: Air Archmage

Reflects some damage back on attacker.
See Tooltip. See WARNINGS.
--------------------------------------------------- !WARNING! Generally, Mass Army Spells do not stack with the Individual or the Mass Faction versions.
Mass Army Spells disable the equivalent Mass Faction Spells (Spellbook).
IF you want to re-enable a specific Mass Faction Spell, dispel the equivalent Mass Army Spell: CTRL-K (Govern) > Enchantments > Dispel
While all Units sharing the Caster Tile will end up with the Enchantment, only one Unit will have a Maintenance Cost (The one with the Dispel Option). If that Unit turns out to be a Trained Unit (instead of a Champion or your Sovereign) this may create issues. To avoid those issues, make sure a Champion is the last Army member. ---------------------------------------------------
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: ::: HIERGAMENON ENTRY ::: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
[S] CLOAK OF THORNS #ARMY ::: Reflects some damage back on attacker.
DOMAIN ::: Strategic ::: Friendly ::: Units #Army
EFFECT ::: 25% DMG Reflect
FIGHTABLE ::: Not Defendable ::: Not Resistible
INTERVAL ::: Until Dispelled (Enchantment)
OTHER ::: Earth Multiplier ::: Time Bonus (Sov) ::: Player Only
::: Incompatible w/ Cloak of Thorns ::: Incompatible w/ Cloak of Thorns #Faction
::: Caster and Targets must be on the same tile
SOURCE ::: Path of the Mage ::: ::: Abjuration

DOMAIN ::: Strategic ::: Friendly ::: Champions+Sovereign #Army
EFFECT ::: + (3 + Life Shards) HP ::: + (3 + Life Shards) Magic Resistance
FIGHTABLE ::: Not Defendable ::: Not Resistible
INTERVAL ::: Until Dispelled (Enchantment)
OTHER ::: Life Multiplier ::: Life Shards (+1 per) ::: Time Bonus (Sov) ::: Player Only
::: Incompatible w/ Courage ::: Incompatible w/ Courage #Faction
::: Caster and Targets must be on the same tile
SOURCE ::: Spell Rank ::: ::: Life Disciple

Targets get a random increase in one base stats.
See Tooltip.

[S] DESTINY'S GIFT #ARMY ::: Targets get a random increase in one base stats.
DOMAIN ::: Strategic ::: Friendly ::: Champions+Sovereign
EFFECT ::: Random ::: + 1 ATK ::: + 1 DEF ::: + 1 HP per Kill ::: + 1 Initiative ::: + 1.25 Magic Resistance ::: + 1.25% Pierce Resistance ::: + 2 Mana per Kill ::: + 2% Air\Lightning Resistance ::: + 2% Fire Resistance ::: + 2% Water\Cold Resistance ::: + 3 HP ::: + 4% Critical Chance ::: + 4% Damage Reflection ::: + 4% Splash Damage ::: + 5 Dodge ::: + 7 Dodge against Ranged
FIGHTABLE ::: Not Defendable ::: Not Resistible
INTERVAL ::: Permanent
OTHER ::: Can Stack ::: Caster must be Sov ::: Player Only
::: Caster and Targets must be on the same tile
SOURCE ::: Tech ::: ::: Third Book of the Magi

--------------------------------------------------- !WARNING! Generally, Mass Army Spells do not stack with the Individual or the Mass Faction versions.
Mass Army Spells disable the equivalent Mass Faction Spells (Spellbook).
IF you want to re-enable a specific Mass Faction Spell, dispel the equivalent Mass Army Spell: CTRL-K (Govern) > Enchantments > Dispel
While all Units sharing the Caster Tile will end up with the Enchantment, only one Unit will have a Maintenance Cost (The one with the Dispel Option). If that Unit turns out to be a Trained Unit (instead of a Champion or your Sovereign) this may create issues. To avoid those issues, make sure a Champion is the last Army member. ---------------------------------------------------
